devdoc.details: Factory contract for creating and managing token streams

constructor.details: Constructor to set the protocol admin

createStream((address,address,address,ui.details: Creates a new stream with the provided configuration

getAcceptedInSupplyTokens().details: Get all accepted input supply tokens

initialize((uint256,address,(uint256),ui.details: Initializes the factory with the provided configuration

isAcceptedInSupplyToken(address).details: Check if a token is accepted as input supply token

returns._0: True if the token is accepted

isStream(address).details: Check if an address is a stream created by this factory

returns._0: True if the address is a stream

setFrozen(bool).details: Sets the frozen state of the factory

params.isFrozen: Whether the factory should be frozen

updateAcceptedTokens(address[],address[].details: Updates the list of accepted input supply tokens

params.tokensToAdd: Array of token addresses to add
params.tokensToRemove: Array of token addresses to remove

updateStreamCreationFeeToken(address).details: Updates the stream creation fee token

devdoc.title: StreamFactory

acceptedInSupplyTokens(address).notice: Mapping of accepted input supply tokens

createStream((address,address,address,ui.notice: Anyone can create a stream if they provide the required tokens and fees

initialize((uint256,address,(uint256),ui.notice: This function can only be called once by the admin

initialized().notice: Flag to ensure initialization happens only once

streamAddresses(uint16).notice: Mapping of stream ID to stream address

userdoc.notice: Handles stream creation, parameter management, and accepted token management
